## CameraRig.disassemble() method

Disassemble the camera from the rig and attach it to the scene. Useful if one needs to set the camera's world position or control it outside of the rig setup

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
disassemble(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
